sentence: yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya iti'ssa muhuttam'pi aphāsu bhavissatī'ti etad'eva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.

grammar: masc gen sg of bhikkhu, from bhikkhati
